lead_paragraph: The spokesmen for the Axis Powers have never gone farther to justify Winston Churchill's description of them as guttersnipes than in their comments on President Roosevelt's Navy Day speech. The aging athlete who uttered a few words from his familiar perch on the balcony of the Palazzo Venezia on Tuesday was the most restrained.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: OCCUPATION AND REHABILITATION OF CONQUERED AREAS
